SELECT a.id ,a.start_time startTime ,a.end_time endTime ,c.subject_name subjectName ,d.exam_name examName FROM exam_exam a LEFT JOIN exam_testpaper_name b ON a.exam_testpaper_id = b.id LEFT JOIN exam_subject c ON b.subject_id = c.id LEFT JOIN exam_type d ON d.id = a.exam_type_id WHERE a.status = 1 AND NOW() >= a.start_time AND NOW() <= a.end_time
and c.subject_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.subjectName},'%')
and d.exam_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.examName},'%')
and NOW() >= a.start_time and NOW() <= a.end_time
and NOW() > a.start_time and NOW() > a.end_time
and NOW() < a.start_time and NOW() < a.end_time
